history.narrative: Law 19-303, the “Pharmacy Technician Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-293. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 2012 and December 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 5, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-670 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-303 became effective on May 1, 2013.
